data.nrql: SELECT PERCENTAGE(COUNT(*), WHERE (group_iops_utilization IS NULL OR group_iops_utilization < 85) AND (offline IS NULL OR offline = 'false')) AS 'Health Score' FROM netapp_eseries_volume FACET netapp_eseries_volume_name
SELECT uniqueCount(netapp_eseries_volume_name) AS 'Volumes' FROM netapp_eseries_volume FACET netapp_eseries_dynamic_disk_pool_name

presentation.title: Dynamic Disk Pool Distribution
presentation.notes: The parent Dynamic Disk Pool of this Volume

data.nrql: SELECT uniqueCount(netapp_eseries_volume_name) AS 'Volumes' FROM netapp_eseries_volume FACET netapp_eseries_volume_group_name

presentation.title: Volume Group Distribution
presentation.notes: The parent Volume Group of this Volume

data.nrql: SELECT uniqueCount(netapp_eseries_volume_name) AS 'Volumes' FROM netapp_eseries_volume FACET protection_type

presentation.title: Protection Type Distribution
presentation.notes: The protection type of the volume.

data.nrql: SELECT uniqueCount(netapp_eseries_volume_name) AS 'Volumes' FROM netapp_eseries_volume FACET raid_level

presentation.title: Raid Level Distribution
presentation.notes: The RAID level for which this volume is configured.

data.nrql: SELECT uniqueCount(netapp_eseries_volume_name) AS 'Volumes' FROM netapp_eseries_volume FACET use
SELECT average(combined_iops) FROM netapp_eseries_volume COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO
SELECT average(combined_latency) FROM netapp_eseries_volume COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Combined Latency (Milliseconds)
presentation.notes: Combined response time for this volume.

data.nrql: SELECT sum(combined_throughput) FROM netapp_eseries_volume COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO
SELECT average(group_iops_utilization) FROM netapp_eseries_volume COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Group IOPS Utilization (Percent)
presentation.notes: The percentage of the volume group's maximum IOPS used by this volume.

data.nrql: SELECT average(read_cache_utilization) FROM netapp_eseries_volume COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Read Cache Utilization (Percent)
presentation.notes: Percentage of bytes read from cache

data.nrql: SELECT average(write_cache_utilization) FROM netapp_eseries_volume COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Write Cache Utilization (Percent)
presentation.notes: Percentage of bytes written to cache
